snippet: Kei Nishikori puffed out his cheeks in relief after he beat Spanish dangerman Fernando Verdasco 6-3 6-4 3-6 2-6 6-4 in a French Open third-round tussle that featured 16 breaks of serve on Friday....
lead_paragraph: Kei Nishikori puffed out his cheeks in relief after he beat Spanish dangerman Fernando Verdasco 6-3 6-4 3-6 2-6 6-4 in a French Open third-round tussle that featured 16 breaks of serve on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Nishikori Survives Five-Set Scrap Against Verdasco
headline.main: Nishikori Survives Five-Set Scrap Against Verdasco
